## model-data-table package

A library that wraps an AgGrid data table with model data from specified property in state.

## Remarks

AgGrid css must be loaded by consumer.

## Classes

|  Class | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [ModelDataTableComponent](./model-data-table.modeldatatablecomponent.md) | Responsible for wrapping an AgGridAngular component. It provides the table with model data &amp; listens to changes for updates. |
|  [ModelDataTableModule](./model-data-table.modeldatatablemodule.md) | Responsible for exporting the [ModelDataTableComponent](./model-data-table.modeldatatablecomponent.md)<!-- -->. |

## Interfaces

|  Interface | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [ModelDataTable](./model-data-table.modeldatatable.md) | Defines a table used to render a AgGridTable for a given state model. |
|  [ModelDataTablesConfig](./model-data-table.modeldatatablesconfig.md) | Represents a configuration object for all model data tables. Provided with token [MODEL\_DATA\_TABLES\_CONFIG](./model-data-table.model_data_tables_config.md) |
|  [ModelPropertyColDef](./model-data-table.modelpropertycoldef.md) | Defines a column for a property on a state model |

## Variables

|  Variable | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [MODEL\_DATA\_TABLES\_CONFIG](./model-data-table.model_data_tables_config.md) |  |
